snippet: Financial advisers recommend that people with substantial assets protect themselves against rare occurrences.
abstract: Financial advisers recommend that people with substantial assets protect themselves against rare occurrences with a personal liability policy; such coverage, commonly called an umbrella policy, is the last line of defense against lawsuits; when other insurance has reached its limit, an umbrella policy will pay claims up to the amount covered.
lead_paragraph: Financial advisers recommend that people with substantial assets protect themselves against rare occurrences.

headline.seo: Personal Liability Insurance Is Essential, Advisers Say
headline.main: Umbrella Policies Fill In Some Gaps
